data.title: Cinematic Game Trailer Animation - Jumbla
data.meta_description: The only thing worse than having no video game trailer is having a bad one. Jumbla offers cinematic trailer animation that is sure to catch gamers attention!
data.text:
Design-Driven Approach with Stylised or Photo-Realisitic Characters

“We tend to produce design-based trailers, which often incorporate both motion graphics and 3D characters,” Jumbla’s Creative Director Callan Woolcock said.

One example comes from Emissary - a futuristic and intricate trailer that keeps the audience guessing about how the game’s narrative will play out.

“Emissary combines aspects of technology with abstract visuals for a sci-fi kind of vibe,” Callan said. “It also features cool transitions and interesting camera movements.

“It’s really well done and a great example of what we’re capable of as far as video game trailers are concerned.”

Our work for the NASCAR expansion of Forza 6 Motorsport is another prime example. By interspersing highly-detailed 3D vehicles with free-flowing cameras and quick transitions, gamers feel they have no choice than to purchase the downloadable content.

“There’s a lot graphic design elements in there, like when the cars and text appear against white space,” added Callan. “But it works perfectly and we’re really proud of this cinematic.”

Game Trailer FAQs

What are in game cinematics and game trailers?

In game cinematics are animated sequences within a video game that help tell the story or enhance the gameplay experience. Game trailers, on the other hand, are promotional videos that showcase the features and excitement of a video game.

Why should I consider using in game cinematics and game trailers for my video games?

In-game cinematics can immerse players in your storyline and create memorable moments, enhancing their overall gaming experience. Game trailers serve as powerful marketing tools to generate interest, attract new players, and increase sales.

What makes a successful game trailer?

A successful game trailer effectively communicates the game's unique features, gameplay mechanics, and overall excitement. It should create an emotional connection, leaving viewers eager to experience the game themselves.

What services does Jumbla provide for Video Game Trailers & In-Game Cinematics?

Jumbla's animation departments offer comprehensive solutions for creating visually-rich video game trailers and in-game cinematics. This includes story development, concept art, production, post-production, and audio services.

How does Jumbla approach creating in-game cinematic sequences?

At Jumbla Animation Studios, we work closely with our clients to understand their vision for their video games' narratives. Our talented team of animators then brings these stories to life through stunning visuals and engaging animations.

What type of game trailers can Jumbla create?

We specialise in creating 2D, 2.5D, and 3D game trailers. With a team passionate about gaming and experience in titles like League of Legends, Guild Wars 2, PUBG, and Destiny 2, we can produce captivating trailers that grab your audience's attention.

How have Jumbla's cinematics contributed to popular game titles?

Our visually captivating cinematic sequences have played pivotal roles in setting the mood and story for well-known games such as PUBG Mobile, Arena of Valor, Destiny 2, and League of Legends.
